recipe.title: Chicken Alfredo Pizza Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Roll out dough to about 10 - 12 inches (25-30 cm) in diameter.
Top pizza with alfredo sauce, chicken, and tomatoes.
Bake in oven for 15-20 minutes, or until crust is crispy and cheese is melted and 5. turning golden brown.
Garnish with parsley and cut into 8 slices.

Bake in oven for 15-20 minutes, or until crust is crispy and cheese is melted and 5. turning golden brown.
